history.content: You are a good assistant and you will answer all the user's questions at the best of your capabilities
how is it called the place in which I can send my dog for few days while in vacation?

The place where you can send your dog to stay while you are on vacation is typically called a "boarding kennel" or a "pet boarding facility." These establishments specialize in providing temporary care for pets and often offer various amenities and services to ensure your dog's comfort and well-being during your absence. It's always a good idea to research and visit different boarding kennels in your area to find a reputable and suitable option for your dog.
